vulnerability_findings.name: use-abi-encodecall-instead-of-encodewithselector
vulnerability_findings.message: To guarantee arguments type safety it is recommended to use `abi.encodeCall` instead of `abi.encodeWithSelector`.

vulnerability_findings.name: init-variables-with-default-value
vulnerability_findings.message: Uninitialized variables are assigned with the types default value. Explicitly initializing a variable with its default value costs unnecessary gas.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-short-revert-string
vulnerability_findings.message: Shortening revert strings to fit in 32 bytes will decrease gas costs for deployment and  gas costs when the revert condition has been met.

vulnerability_findings.name: curve-readonly-reentrancy
vulnerability_findings.message: ICurveFi(curvefi).get_virtual_price() call on a Curve pool is not protected from the read- only reentrancy.

vulnerability_findings.name: curve-readonly-reentrancy
vulnerability_findings.message: ICurveFi(curvefi).get_virtual_price() call on a Curve pool is not protected from the read- only reentrancy.

vulnerability_findings.message: No slippage check in a Uniswap v2/v3 trade

vulnerability_findings.name: constant-function
vulnerability_findings.message: Address.isContract (StrategyPickleWBTC.sol#70-76) is declared view but contains assembly code

vulnerability_findings.name: incorrect-equality
vulnerability_findings.message:
StrategyWBTCPickle.balanceOfPickle (StrategyPickleWBTC.sol#364-373) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- pickletokenNum == 0

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in StrategyWBTCPickle._withdrawSome (StrategyPickleWBTC.sol#298-323):
	External calls:
	- crvBefore = IERC20(crvPla).balanceOf(address(this)) (StrategyPickleWBTC.sol#299)
	- _crvpla = _amount.mul(1e18).div((ICurveFi(curvefi).get_virtual_price().div(1e10))) (StrategyPickleWBTC.sol#300)
	- _p3crv = _crvpla.mul(1e18).div(yERC20(pickleJar).getRatio()) (StrategyPickleWBTC.sol#304)
	- _before = IERC20(pickleJar).balanceOf(address(this)) (StrategyPickleWBTC.sol#305)
	- pERC20(PICKLE).withdraw(pickleindex,_p3crv) (StrategyPickleWBTC.sol#313)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- pledgePickles (StrategyPickleWBTC.sol#314)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in StrategyWBTCPickle.harvest (StrategyPickleWBTC.sol#388-393):
	External calls:
	- pERC20(PICKLE).withdraw(pickleindex,pledgePickles) (StrategyPickleWBTC.sol#390)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- pledgePickles (StrategyPickleWBTC.sol#391)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in StrategyWBTCPickle.harvest (StrategyPickleWBTC.sol#388-393):
	External calls:
	- pERC20(PICKLE).withdraw(pickleindex,pledgePickles) (StrategyPickleWBTC.sol#390)
	- redelivery() (StrategyPickleWBTC.sol#392)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- pledgePickles (StrategyPickleWBTC.sol#392)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in StrategyWBTCPickle.withdrawAll (StrategyPickleWBTC.sol#288-295):
	External calls:
	- amount = balanceOf() (StrategyPickleWBTC.sol#289)
	- balance = _withdraw(amount) (StrategyPickleWBTC.sol#290)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- pledgePickles (StrategyPickleWBTC.sol#290)

vulnerability_findings.name: unused-return
vulnerability_findings.message:
StrategyWBTCPickle.doApprove (StrategyPickleWBTC.sol#232-235) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-IERC20(pickletoken).approve(unirouter,0) (StrategyPickleWBTC.sol#233)
	-IERC20(pickletoken).approve(unirouter,uint256(- 1)) (StrategyPickleWBTC.sol#234)

vulnerability_findings.name: unused-return
vulnerability_findings.message:
StrategyWBTCPickle.redelivery (StrategyPickleWBTC.sol#395-405) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-UniswapRouter(unirouter).swapExactTokensForTokens(_2token,0,swap2TokenRouting,address(this),now.add(1800)) (StrategyPickleWBTC.sol#401)
	-UniswapRouter(unirouter).swapExactTokensForTokens(_2bt,0,swap2BTRouting,Controller(controller).rewards(),now.add(1800)) (StrategyPickleWBTC.sol#402)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in StrategyWBTCPickle.constructor (StrategyPickleWBTC.sol#224-230):
	External calls:
	- doApprove() (StrategyPickleWBTC.sol#227)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- swap2BTRouting (StrategyPickleWBTC.sol#228)
	- swap2TokenRouting (StrategyPickleWBTC.sol#229)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in StrategyWBTCPickle.deposit (StrategyPickleWBTC.sol#237-261):
	External calls:
	- _wbtc = IERC20(want).balanceOf(address(this)) (StrategyPickleWBTC.sol#238)
	- ICurveFi(curvefi).add_liquidity((0,_wbtc),0) (StrategyPickleWBTC.sol#242)
	- _crvpla = IERC20(crvPla).balanceOf(address(this)) (StrategyPickleWBTC.sol#245)
	- yERC20(pickleJar).deposit(_crvpla) (StrategyPickleWBTC.sol#250)
	- _p3crv = IERC20(pickleJar).balanceOf(address(this)) (StrategyPickleWBTC.sol#253)
	- pERC20(PICKLE).deposit(pickleindex,_p3crv) (StrategyPickleWBTC.sol#258)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- pledgePickles (StrategyPickleWBTC.sol#259)

Address.isContract uses assembly (StrategyPickleWBTC.sol#70-76)
	- StrategyPickleWBTC.sol#74
